overview: A talented Tabla player is unable to handle his meteoric rise and squanders away his talent and happiness when he finds himself falling for a danseuse even as he beats himself up for ignoring his loving wife. A tragic drama that is also a showcase for Natya Sangeet, Hindustani Classical and folksy Laavani.

production_companies.name: The Maharashtra Film Industrial Co-Operative Society Ltd.

title: Rangalya Ratri Asha
